name: Viridescent Dragon: Chapter 3
storyline: A continuation of Viridescent Dragon: Chapter 2. While Seleste is still missing, Charlotte and Dawn set out to the wintry town of Laseaux on yet another errand for Dr. Cendrillon. At the same time, the annual Mach Ball tournament is being held along with alphaLord Rosary's daughter, Margaux's Coming-of-Age Ceremony. However, Margaux seems to have other plans. Will Charlotte and Dawn succeed in their mission? Will they ever find Seleste? Read on to see what happens next!
summary: A continuation of Viridescent Dragon: Chapter 2.
